name: Khaki
description:
Complete any outfit with a Hair Bow or Bow Tie!

These bows are handmade so please allow time for production (5-7 days) and delivery (3-5 days using priority mail) after payment is made.

All Hair Bows come with earrings made out of surgical steel.


Please email us if you would like a custom bow: ksbows13@gmail.com

Hair Bow Sizes:

Tiny: 2.75” length by 1.25” width
Small: 4” length by 2.25” width
Medium: 5.25” length by 2.75 width
Large: 7.25” length by 4” width

Earring size equivalents:

5/8” = dime 
3/4" = penny
7/8” = nickel
1 1/8” = quarter
